webscript.shortname: sinekarta remote PU digital signature apply
webscript.description:
script to apply a remote digital signature. accept one mandatory parameters as url parameter : requestType - values : json or xml - tell to the service that the body of this post request contains the corresponding request format the body of the post must contains an area with this parameters : json : {"digitalSignatureArea" : "xxx", "nodeRef":"a"} xml :
xxx nodeRef
NodeRef must be the nodeRef a common parent of all document you need to sign (the same passed in init) in this format : workspace://SpacesStore/e55635f6-c8c9-4e0d-ae99-55e600a77a1d for detail about format of content received, please see org.sinekarta.alfresco.webscript.request.PUSignApplyRequest supported return types : xml, json default : xml To use this service you have to call : 1. digitalSignatureInit - receiving a common parent of all document, returning an digitalSignatureArea 2...n. digitalSignaturePrepareAndAddDocument - receiving digitalSignatureArea and the document to be signed, returning digitalSignatureArea n+1. digitalSignatureApply - receiving digitalSignatureArea and a common parent of all document (same of 1), returning none The digitalSignatureArea it's an handle to be saved and passed to client part of digital signature.
